trans-unit.source: "CBC" refers to Cipher Block Chaining, which means that a portion of the previously encrypted cipher text is used in the encryption of the current block. "DES" refers to the Data Encryption Standard [AC96, ch12], which has a number of variants (including DES40 and 3DES_EDE). "Idea" is currently one of the best and cryptographically strongest algorithms available, and "RC2" is a proprietary algorithm from RSA DSI [AC96, ch13].

The total number of file descriptors used by Apache is one for each distinct error log file, one for every other log file directive, plus 10-20 for internal use. Unix operating systems limit the number of file descriptors that may be used by a process; the limit is typically 64, and may usually be increased up to a large hard-limit.

trans-unit.source: ) is available. It can be used to build DSO based modules outside of the Apache httpd source tree. The idea is simple: When installing Apache HTTP Server the configure's make install procedure installs the Apache httpd C header files and puts the platform-dependent compiler and linker flags for building DSO files into the apxs program. This way the user can use apxs to compile his Apache httpd module sources without the Apache httpd distribution source tree and without having to fiddle with the platform-dependent compiler and linker flags for DSO support.
trans-unit.target: ）可用。它可用于在Apache httpd源代码树之外构建基于DSO的模块。这个想法很简单：在安装Apache HTTP Server时， configure 的 make install 过程将安装Apache httpd C头文件，并将用于构建DSO文件的平台相关的编译器和链接器标志放入 apxs 程序中。这样，用户可以使用 apxs 来编译他的Apache httpd模块源，而无需使用Apache httpd分发源树，而不必摆弄DSO支持的依赖于平台的编译器和链接器标志。

trans-unit.source: ), by contrast, appears to the client just like an ordinary web server. No special configuration on the client is necessary. The client makes ordinary requests for content in the namespace of the reverse proxy. The reverse proxy then decides where to send those requests and returns the content as if it were itself the origin.
trans-unit.target: ），相反，它对客户端而言就像普通的Web服务器一样。客户端上不需要特殊配置。客户端向反向代理的名称空间中的内容发出普通请求。然后，反向代理决定将这些请求发送到哪里，并像返回内容本身一样返回内容。

trans-unit.source: , one-way function or hash function. Message digests are used to create a short, fixed-length representation of a longer, variable-length message. Digest algorithms are designed to produce a unique digest for each message. Message digests are designed to make it impractically difficult to determine the message from the digest and (in theory) impossible to find two different messages which create the same digest -- thus eliminating the possibility of substituting one message for another while maintaining the same digest.
trans-unit.target: ，单向函数或哈希函数。消息摘要用于为较长的可变长度消息创建简短的，固定长度的表示形式。摘要算法旨在为每个消息生成唯一的摘要。消息摘要旨在使从摘要中确定消息变得不切实际地困难，并且（从理论上来说）不可能找到创建相同摘要的两个不同消息-从而消除了在保持相同摘要的情况下将一条消息替换为另一条消息的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Backus-Naur Form (BNF) is a notation technique for context-free grammars, often used to describe the syntax of languages used in computing. In most cases, expressions are used to express boolean values. For these, the starting point in the BNF is expr. However, a few directives like LogMessage accept expressions that evaluate to a string value. For those, the starting point in the BNF is string.
trans-unit.target: Backus-Naur形式（BNF）是一种上下文无关语法的表示法，通常用于描述计算中使用的语言的语法。在大多数情况下，表达式用于表示布尔值。对于这些，BNF中的起点是 expr 。但是，一些指令（例如 LogMessage )会接受计算结果为字符串值的表达式。对于这些，BNF中的起点是 string 。

trans-unit.source: RFC 2616 §19.6 "Compatibility With Previous Versions" had encouraged HTTP servers to support legacy HTTP/0.9 requests. RFC 7230 supersedes this with "The expectation to support HTTP/0.9 requests has been removed" and offers additional comments in RFC 7230 Appendix A. The Require1.0 option allows the user to remove support of the default Allow0.9 option's behavior.
trans-unit.target: RFC 2616§19.6 “与先前版本的兼容性”鼓励HTTP服务器支持旧版HTTP / 0.9请求。 RFC 7230以“已删除了对支持HTTP / 0.9请求的期望”代替了该文档，并在RFC 7230附录A中提供了其他注释。该 Require1.0 选项允许用户要删除支持默认的 Allow0.9 选项的行为。

trans-unit.source: RFC 7231 §4.1 "Request Methods" "Overview" requires that origin servers shall respond with a HTTP 501 status code when an unsupported method is encountered in the request line. This already happens when the LenientMethods option is used, but administrators may wish to toggle the RegisteredMethods option and register any non-standard methods using the RegisterHttpMethod directive, particularly if the Unsafe option has been toggled.
trans-unit.target: RFC 7231§4.1 “请求方法”“概述”要求当请求行中遇到不受支持的方法时，原始服务器应使用HTTP 501状态码进行响应。使用 LenientMethods 选项时已经发生了这种情况，但是管理员可能希望切换 RegisteredMethods 选项并使用 RegisterHttpMethod 指令注册任何非标准方法，特别是如果已切换了 Unsafe 选项。

trans-unit.source: htcacheclean has two modes of operation. It can be run as persistent daemon, or periodically from cron. htcacheclean can take up to an hour or more to process very large (tens of gigabytes) caches and if you are running it from cron it is recommended that you determine how long a typical run takes, to avoid running more than one instance at a time.
trans-unit.target: htcacheclean具有两种操作模式。它可以作为持久守护程序运行，也可以从cron定期运行。htcacheclean可能需要一个小时或更长时间来处理非常大（数十GB）的高速缓存，如果从cron运行它，建议您确定一次典型运行需要多长时间，以避免一次运行多个实例。

trans-unit.source: Name-based virtual host support requires httpd to know the IP address(es) of the host that httpd is running on. To get this address it uses either the global ServerName (if present) or calls the C function gethostname (which should return the same as typing "hostname" at the command prompt). Then it performs a DNS lookup on this address. At present there is no way to avoid this lookup.
trans-unit.target: 基于名称的虚拟主机支持要求httpd知道运行 httpd 的主机的IP地址。要获取此地址，它使用全局 ServerName （如果存在）或调用C函数 gethostname （返回与在命令提示符下键入“ hostname”相同的函数）。然后，它在该地址上执行DNS查找。目前没有办法避免这种查找。

trans-unit.source: %{LA-U:variable} can be used for look-aheads which perform an internal (URL-based) sub-request to determine the final value of variable. This can be used to access variable for rewriting which is not available at the current stage, but will be set in a later phase.
trans-unit.target: %{LA-U:variable} 可用于执行内部（基于URL）子请求以确定 variable的最终值的前瞻。这可以用于访问变量以进行重写，该变量在当前阶段尚不可用，但将在以后的阶段中进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The functionsaccept_mutex_on and accept_mutex_off implement a mutual exclusion semaphore. Only one child can have the mutex at any time. There are several choices for implementing these mutexes. The choice is defined in src/conf.h (pre-1.3) or src/include/ap_config.h (1.3 or later). Some architectures do not have any locking choice made, on these architectures it is unsafe to use multiple Listen directives.
trans-unit.target: 函数 accept_mutex_on 和 accept_mutex_off 实现互斥信号量。任何时候只有一个孩子可以使用该互斥锁。实现这些互斥有多种选择。该选项在 src/conf.h （1.3之前的版本）或 src/include/ap_config.h （1.3或更高版本）中定义。某些体系结构没有做出任何锁定选择，在这些体系结构上，使用多个 Listen 指令是不安全的。

trans-unit.source: %{ENV:variable}, where variable can be any environment variable, is also available. This is looked-up via internal Apache httpd structures and (if not found there) via getenv() from the Apache httpd server process.
trans-unit.target: %{ENV:variable} （其中variable可以是任何环境变量）。这是通过内部Apache httpd结构查找的（如果未在其中找到），可以通过Apache httpd服务器进程的 getenv() 查找。

trans-unit.source: %{HTTP:header}, where header can be any HTTP MIME-header name, can always be used to obtain the value of a header sent in the HTTP request. Example: %{HTTP:Proxy-Connection} is the value of the HTTP header ``Proxy-Connection:''.
trans-unit.target: %{HTTP:header} （标头可以是任何HTTP MIME标头名称）始终可以用于获取HTTP请求中发送的标头的值。示例： %{HTTP:Proxy-Connection} 是HTTP标头`` Proxy-Connection: ''的值。

trans-unit.source: %{LA-F:variable} can be used to perform an internal (filename-based) sub-request, to determine the final value of variable. Most of the time, this is the same as LA-U above.
trans-unit.target: %{LA-F:variable} 可用于执行内部（基于文件名的）子请求，以确定variable的最终值。在大多数情况下，这与上面的LA-U相同。

trans-unit.source: %{SSL:variable}, where variable is the name of an SSL environment variable, can be used whether or not mod_ssl is loaded, but will always expand to the empty string if it is not. Example: %{SSL:SSL_CIPHER_USEKEYSIZE} may expand to 128. These variables are available even without setting the StdEnvVars option of the SSLOptions directive.
trans-unit.target: %{SSL:variable} （变量是SSL环境变量的名称），无论是否加载 mod_ssl 均可使用，但如果未加载，则始终扩展为空字符串。示例： %{SSL:SSL_CIPHER_USEKEYSIZE} 可能扩展为 128 。即使未设置 SSLOptions 指令的 StdEnvVars 选项，这些变量也可用。

trans-unit.source: <AuthnProviderAlias> and </AuthnProviderAlias> are used to enclose a group of authentication directives that can be referenced by the alias name using one of the directives AuthBasicProvider or AuthDigestProvider.
trans-unit.target: <AuthnProviderAlias> 和 </AuthnProviderAlias> 用于封装一组身份验证指令，可以使用指令 AuthBasicProvider 或 AuthDigestProvider 中的一个别名名称来引用该身份验证指令。

trans-unit.source: <AuthzProviderAlias> and </AuthzProviderAlias> are used to enclose a group of authorization directives that can be referenced by the alias name using the directive Require.
trans-unit.target: <AuthzProviderAlias> 和 </AuthzProviderAlias> 用于封装一组授权指令，可以使用指令 Require 通过别名来引用这些授权指令。

trans-unit.source: <Directory> and </Directory> are used to enclose a group of directives that will apply only to the named directory, sub-directories of that directory, and the files within the respective directories. Any directive that is allowed in a directory context may be used. Directory-path is either the full path to a directory, or a wild-card string using Unix shell-style matching. In a wild-card string, ? matches any single character, and * matches any sequences of characters. You may also use [] character ranges. None of the wildcards match a `/' character, so <Directory "/*/public_html"> will not match /home/user/public_html, but <Directory "/home/*/public_html"> will match. Example:
trans-unit.target: <Directory> 和 </Directory> 用于封装一组指令，这些指令仅适用于命名目录，该目录的子目录以及相应目录中的文件。可以使用目录上下文中允许的任何指令。 Directory-path 是目录的完整路径，或者是使用Unix Shell样式匹配的通配符字符串。在通配符字符串中， ? 匹配任何单个字符， * 匹配任何字符序列。您也可以使用 [] 个字符范围。所有通配符都不匹配'/'字符，因此 <Directory "/*/public_html"> 将不匹配 /home/user/public_html ，但是 <Directory "/home/*/public_html"> 将匹配。例：

trans-unit.source: <DirectoryMatch> and </DirectoryMatch> are used to enclose a group of directives which will apply only to the named directory (and the files within), the same as <Directory>. However, it takes as an argument a regular expression. For example:
trans-unit.target: <DirectoryMatch> 和 </DirectoryMatch> 用于封装一组指令，这些指令仅适用于与 <Directory> 相同的命名目录（及其中的文件）。但是，它以正则表达式作为参数。例如：

trans-unit.source: <IfDefine> sections are nest-able, which can be used to implement simple multiple-parameter tests. Example:
trans-unit.target: <IfDefine> 节是可嵌套的，可用于实现简单的多参数测试。例：

trans-unit.source: <IfModule> sections are nest-able, which can be used to implement simple multiple-module tests.
trans-unit.target: <IfModule> 节是可嵌套的，可用于实现简单的多模块测试。

trans-unit.source: <LimitExcept> and </LimitExcept> are used to enclose a group of access control directives which will then apply to any HTTP access method not listed in the arguments; i.e., it is the opposite of a <Limit> section and can be used to control both standard and nonstandard/unrecognized methods. See the documentation for <Limit> for more details.
trans-unit.target: <LimitExcept> 和 </LimitExcept> 用于封装一组访问控制指令，这些指令随后将应用于未在参数中列出的任何HTTP访问方法。即，它与 <Limit> 部分相反，可用于控制标准方法和非标准/无法识别的方法。有关更多详细信息，请参见 <Limit> 的文档。

trans-unit.source: <Location> sections operate completely outside the filesystem. This has several consequences. Most importantly, <Location> directives should not be used to control access to filesystem locations. Since several different URLs may map to the same filesystem location, such access controls may by circumvented.
trans-unit.target: <Location> 节完全在文件系统外部运行。这有几个后果。最重要的是，不应使用 <Location> 指令来控制对文件系统位置的访问。由于几个不同的URL可能映射到相同的文件系统位置，因此可以规避此类访问控制。

trans-unit.source: <RequireAll> and </RequireAll> are used to enclose a group of authorization directives of which none must fail and at least one must succeed in order for the <RequireAll> directive to succeed.
trans-unit.target: <RequireAll> 和 </RequireAll> 用于封装一组授权伪指令，为了使 <RequireAll> 伪指令能够成功执行，这些伪指令必须都必须失败并且至少必须成功。

trans-unit.source: <RequireAny> and </RequireAny> are used to enclose a group of authorization directives of which one must succeed in order for the <RequireAny> directive to succeed.
trans-unit.target: <RequireAny> 和 </RequireAny> 用于封装一组授权指令，为了使 <RequireAny> 指令成功，必须授权一组授权指令。

trans-unit.source: <RequireNone> and </RequireNone> are used to enclose a group of authorization directives of which none must succeed in order for the <RequireNone> directive to not fail.
trans-unit.target: <RequireNone> 和 </RequireNone> 用于封装一组授权指令，为了使 <RequireNone> 指令不失败，授权指令中的任何一个都不能成功。

trans-unit.source: <VirtualHost> and </VirtualHost> are used to enclose a group of directives that will apply only to a particular virtual host. Any directive that is allowed in a virtual host context may be used. When the server receives a request for a document on a particular virtual host, it uses the configuration directives enclosed in the <VirtualHost> section. Addr can be any of the following, optionally followed by a colon and a port number (or *):
trans-unit.target: <VirtualHost> 和 </VirtualHost> 用于封装仅适用于特定虚拟主机的一组指令。可以使用虚拟主机上下文中允许的任何指令。服务器在特定虚拟主机上收到文档请求时，将使用 <VirtualHost> 部分中包含的配置指令。 Addr 可以是以下任意一种，可以选择后面跟一个冒号和一个端口号（或*）：

trans-unit.source: (ab)+ matches ababab - that is, the + applies to the group. For more on backreferences see below.
trans-unit.target: (ab)+ 与 ababab 匹配-即 + 适用于该组。有关反向引用的更多信息，请参见下文。

trans-unit.source: +: move matching ciphers to the current location in list
trans-unit.target: + ：将匹配的密码移动到列表中的当前位置

trans-unit.source: --enable-v4-mapped is the default on all platforms except FreeBSD, NetBSD, and OpenBSD, so this is probably how your httpd was built.
trans-unit.target: --enable-v4-mapped 是FreeBSD，NetBSD和OpenBSD以外的所有平台上的默认设置，因此这可能是httpd的构建方式。

trans-unit.source: -: remove cipher from list (can be added later again)
trans-unit.target: - ：从列表中删除密码（可以稍后再添加）

trans-unit.source: -DescriptionWidth (or unset) allows mod_autoindex to calculate the best width.
trans-unit.target: -DescriptionWidth （或撤消）允许 mod_autoindex 来计算最佳宽度。

trans-unit.source: -NameWidth (or unset) allows mod_autoindex to calculate the best width, but only up to 20 bytes wide.
trans-unit.target: -NameWidth （或未设置）允许 mod_autoindex 计算最佳宽度，但最大宽度为20个字节。

trans-unit.source: -f specifies a path to a particular configuration file
trans-unit.target: -f 指定特定配置文件的路径

trans-unit.source: -f specifies an absolute or relative path to a particular configuration file:
trans-unit.target: -f 指定到特定配置文件的绝对或相对路径：

trans-unit.source: -n specifies the installed Apache service whose configuration file is to be used:
trans-unit.target: -n 指定要使用其配置文件的已安装Apache服务：

trans-unit.source: .htaccess files (or "distributed configuration files") provide a way to make configuration changes on a per-directory basis. A file, containing one or more configuration directives, is placed in a particular document directory, and the directives apply to that directory, and all subdirectories thereof.
trans-unit.target: .htaccess 文件（或“分布式配置文件”）提供了一种基于每个目录进行配置更改的方法。包含一个或多个配置指令的文件放置在特定的文档目录中，这些指令适用于该目录及其所有子目录。

trans-unit.source: .htaccess files provide a way to make configuration changes on a per-directory basis.
trans-unit.target: .htaccess 文件提供了一种基于每个目录进行配置更改的方法。

trans-unit.source: .htaccess files should be used in a case where the content providers need to make configuration changes to the server on a per-directory basis, but do not have root access on the server system. In the event that the server administrator is not willing to make frequent configuration changes, it might be desirable to permit individual users to make these changes in .htaccess files for themselves. This is particularly true, for example, in cases where ISPs are hosting multiple user sites on a single machine, and want their users to be able to alter their configuration.
trans-unit.target: .htaccess 如果内容提供者需要基于每个目录对服务器进行配置更改，但在服务器系统上没有root用户访问权限，则应使用.htaccess文件。如果服务器管理员不愿意频繁更改配置，则可能希望允许单个用户自己对 .htaccess 文件进行这些更改。例如，在ISP在一台计算机上托管多个用户站点并希望其用户能够更改其配置的情况下，尤其如此。

trans-unit.source: AddIconByType should be used in preference to AddIcon, when possible.
AuthDigestDomain should list the locations that will be protected by this configuration.
trans-unit.target: AuthDigestDomain 应该列出受此配置保护的位置。

trans-unit.source: <Directory> for a description of how regular expressions are mixed in with normal <Directory>s
trans-unit.target: <Directory> 为如何的正则表达式与正常混合的描述 <Directory> 小号

trans-unit.source: DirectoryIndex will be evaluated only for directories requested with trailing slash.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryIndex 的将被计算仅与斜线要求的目录。

trans-unit.source: H2MaxSessionStreams limits the number of parallel requests that a client can make on a HTTP/2 connection. It depends on your site how many you should allow. The default is 100 which is plenty and unless you run into memory problems, I would keep it this way. Most requests that browsers send are GETs without a body, so they use up only a little bit of memory until the actual processing starts.
trans-unit.target: H2MaxSessionStreams 限制了客户端可以在HTTP / 2连接上发出的并行请求的数量。这取决于您的站点应允许多少个。默认值为100，这足够了，除非遇到内存问题，否则我将保持这种方式。浏览器发送的大多数请求都是不带正文的GET，因此它们仅占用一点内存，直到开始实际处理为止。

trans-unit.source: H2WindowSize controls how much the client is allowed to send as body of a request, before it waits for the server to encourage more. Or, the other way around, it is the amount of request body data the server needs to be able to buffer. This is per request.
trans-unit.target: H2WindowSize 控制在客户端等待服务器鼓励更多之前，允许客户端作为请求的主体发送多少。或者，相反，它是服务器需要能够缓冲的请求主体数据量。这是每个请求。

trans-unit.source: RewriteMap directives of the type prg are not started during server initialization if they're defined in a context that does not have RewriteEngine set to on
trans-unit.target: RewriteMap 如果在未将 RewriteEngine 设置为 on 的上下文中定义了 prg 类型的 RewriteMap伪指令，则不会在服务器初始化期间启动

trans-unit.source: SSLCADNRequestFile must specify an all-in-one file containing a concatenation of PEM-encoded CA certificates.
trans-unit.target: SSLCADNRequestFile 必须指定一个包含PEM编码的CA证书的串联的多合一文件。

trans-unit.source: CGIMapExtension - This directive maps a CGI file extension to a script interpreter.
trans-unit.target: CGIMapExtension -此伪指令将CGI文件扩展名映射到脚本解释器。

trans-unit.source: mod_alias provides the Redirect and RedirectMatch directives, which provide a means to redirect one URL to another. This kind of simple redirection of one URL, or a class of URLs, to somewhere else, should be accomplished using these directives rather than RewriteRule. RedirectMatch allows you to include a regular expression in your redirection criteria, providing many of the benefits of using RewriteRule.
trans-unit.target: mod_alias 提供了 Redirect 和 RedirectMatch 指令，它们提供了一种将一个URL重定向到另一个URL的方法。应该使用这些指令而不是 RewriteRule 来实现将一种URL或一类URL进行这种简单的重定向到其他地方的操作。 RedirectMatch 允许您在重定向条件中包括正则表达式，从而提供使用 RewriteRule 的许多好处。

trans-unit.source: mod_authn_dbm and mod_authn_dbd are two modules which make this possible. Rather than selecting AuthBasicProvider file, instead you can choose dbm or dbd as your storage format.
trans-unit.target: mod_authn_dbm 和 mod_authn_dbd 是使这成为可能的两个模块。您可以选择 dbm 或 dbd 作为存储格式，而不是选择 AuthBasicProvider file 。

trans-unit.source: mod_cache, intermediate proxies and browsers may each cache responses and cause the either page to be shown outside of the time-window configured. mod_expires may be used to control this effect. You are, of course, much better off simply serving the content dynamically, and customizing it based on the time of day.
trans-unit.target: mod_cache ，中间代理和浏览器可能各自缓存响应，并使任一页面显示在配置的时间窗口之外。 mod_expires 可用于控制此效果。当然，您只需要动态地提供内容并根据一天中的时间对其进行自定义，就会更好。

trans-unit.source: mod_dbd will need to be configured to point at the right database for this statement to be executed.
trans-unit.target: mod_dbd 需要将 mod_dbd配置为指向正确的数据库以执行此语句。

trans-unit.source: mod_http2 inspect response header for Link headers in a certain format:
trans-unit.target: mod_http2 检查响应标头中是否存在某种格式的 Link 标头：

trans-unit.source: mod_http2 uses the library of nghttp2 as its implementation base. In order to build mod_http2 you need at least version 1.2.1 of libnghttp2 installed on your system.
trans-unit.target: mod_http2 使用的库 nghttp2作为其实现的基础。为了构建 mod_http2 ,您至少需要在系统上安装 libnghttp2 的 1.2.1版本。

trans-unit.source: mod_http2 will not work around this limit by default. The reason is that prefork is today only chosen, if you run processing engines that are not prepared for multi-threading, e.g. will crash with more than one request.
trans-unit.target: mod_http2 默认情况下， mod_http2将无法解决此限制。原因是，如果您运行的处理器未准备好进行多线程处理，例如，会因多个请求而崩溃，那么今天只能选择 prefork 。

trans-unit.source: XBitHack tells Apache to parse files for SSI directives if they have the execute bit set. So, to add SSI directives to an existing page, rather than having to change the file name, you would just need to make the file executable using chmod.
trans-unit.target: XBitHack 告诉Apache为SSI指令解析文件，如果它们具有执行位设置。因此，要将SSI指令添加到现有页面，而不必更改文件名，只需使用 chmod 使文件可执行。

trans-unit.source: mod_ldap and mod_authnz_ldap, with corresponding dependency on openldap.
trans-unit.target: mod_ldap 和 mod_authnz_ldap ，对openldap有相应的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: mod_lua module, with corresponding dependency on lua.
trans-unit.target: mod_lua 模块，对lua有相应的依赖性。

trans-unit.source: NWSSLTrustedCerts - Adds trusted certificates that are used to create secure connections to proxied servers.
trans-unit.target: NWSSLTrustedCerts -添加用于创建到代理服务器的安全连接的受信任证书。

trans-unit.source: NWSSLUpgradeable - Allow a connection created on the specified address/port to be upgraded to an SSL connection.
trans-unit.target: NWSSLUpgradeable -允许将在指定地址/端口上创建的连接升级为SSL连接。

trans-unit.source: SecureListen - Enables SSL encryption for a specified port.
mod_proxy_html module, with corresponding dependency on libxml2.
trans-unit.target: mod_proxy_html 模块，对libxml2具有相应的依赖性。

trans-unit.source: mod_rewrite is frequently used to take a particular action based on the presence or absence of a particular environment variable or request header. This can be done more efficiently using the <If>.
trans-unit.target: mod_rewrite 通常用于根据是否存在特定环境变量或请求标头来执行特定操作。使用 <If> 可以更有效地完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: mod_rewrite provides a way to modify incoming URL requests, dynamically, based on regular expression rules. This allows you to map arbitrary URLs onto your internal URL structure in any way you like.
trans-unit.target: mod_rewrite 提供了一种基于正则表达式规则动态修改传入URL请求的方法。这使您可以按照自己喜欢的任何方式将任意URL映射到内部URL结构上。

trans-unit.source: mod_rewrite should be considered a last resort, when other alternatives are found wanting. Using it when there are simpler alternatives leads to configurations which are confusing, fragile, and hard to maintain. Understanding what other alternatives are available is a very important step towards mod_rewrite mastery.
trans-unit.target: mod_rewrite 如果发现其他替代方案，则 mod_rewrite应该被视为万不得已。当有更简单的选择时使用它会导致配置混乱，易碎且难以维护。理解还有哪些其他选择是实现 mod_rewrite 掌握的非常重要的一步。

trans-unit.source: RewriteRule provides the [P] flag to pass rewritten URIs through mod_proxy.
trans-unit.target: RewriteRule 提供 [P]标志以通过 mod_proxy 传递重写的URI。

trans-unit.source: mod_socache_dc module, with corresponding dependency on distcache.

mod_ssl can log extremely verbose debugging information to the error log, when its LogLevel is set to the higher trace levels. On the other hand, on a very busy server, level info may already be too much. Remember that you can configure the LogLevel per module to suite your needs.
trans-unit.target: mod_ssl 当其 LogLevel 设置为较高的跟踪级别时， mod_ssl可以将极其详细的调试信息记录到错误日志中。另一方面，在非常繁忙的服务器上，级别 info 可能已经太多。请记住，您可以为每个模块配置 LogLevel 以适应您的需求。

trans-unit.source: mod_ssl module, with corresponding dependency on openssl.
trans-unit.target: mod_ssl 模块，对openssl的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: SuexecUserGroup may be used inside a VirtualHost directive if the suEXEC wrapper is used.
trans-unit.target: SuexecUserGroup 如果使用 suEXEC包装器，则可以在VirtualHost指令内使用 SuexecUserGroup。

trans-unit.source: MaxConnectionsPerChild - Like the Unix directive, this controls how many connections a worker thread will serve before exiting. The recommended default, MaxConnectionsPerChild 0, causes the thread to continue servicing request indefinitely. It is recommended on NetWare, unless there is some specific reason, that this directive always remain set to 0.
trans-unit.target: MaxConnectionsPerChild -与Unix指令一样，它控制工作线程在退出之前将服务的连接数量。推荐的默认值 MaxConnectionsPerChild 0 使线程无限期地继续服务请求。除非有特殊原因，否则建议在NetWare上将此指令始终设置为 0 。

trans-unit.source: MaxConnectionsPerChild: Like the Unix directive, this controls how many connections a single child process will serve before exiting. However, unlike on Unix, a replacement process is not instantly available. Use the default MaxConnectionsPerChild 0, unless instructed to change the behavior to overcome a memory leak in third party modules or in-process applications.
trans-unit.target: MaxConnectionsPerChild ：与Unix指令一样，它控制单个子进程在退出前将服务的连接数量。但是，与Unix不同，替换过程不是立即可用的。使用默认的 MaxConnectionsPerChild 0 ，除非指示更改行为以克服第三方模块或进程内应用程序中的内存泄漏。

trans-unit.source: MaxSpareThreads - This directive instructs the server to begin terminating worker threads if the number of idle threads ever exceeds this value. The recommended default is MaxSpareThreads 100.
trans-unit.target: MaxSpareThreads -该指令指示服务器在空闲线程数超过此值时开始终止工作线程。推荐的默认值为 MaxSpareThreads 100 。

trans-unit.source: MinSpareThreads - This directive instructs the server to spawn additional worker threads if the number of idle threads ever falls below this value. The recommended default is MinSpareThreads 10.
trans-unit.target: MinSpareThreads -此指令指示服务器在空闲线程数降至该值以下时产生其他工作线程。推荐的默认值为 MinSpareThreads 10 。

trans-unit.source: StartThreads - This directive tells the server how many threads it should start initially. The recommended default is StartThreads 50.
trans-unit.target: StartThreads -该指令告诉服务器最初应启动多少个线程。推荐的默认值为 StartThreads 50 。

trans-unit.source: ThreadsPerChild: This directive is new. It tells the server how many threads it should use. This is the maximum number of connections the server can handle at once, so be sure to set this number high enough for your site if you get a lot of hits. The recommended default is ThreadsPerChild 150, but this must be adjusted to reflect the greatest anticipated number of simultaneous connections to accept.
trans-unit.target: ThreadsPerChild ：此伪指令是新的。它告诉服务器应该使用多少个线程。这是服务器一次可以处理的最大连接数，因此，如果点击率很高，请确保为您的站点设置足够高的连接数。推荐的默认值是 ThreadsPerChild 150 ，但是必须对其进行调整以反映要接受的同时连接的最大预期数量。

trans-unit.source: ThreadStackSize - This directive tells the server what size of stack to use for the individual worker thread. The recommended default is ThreadStackSize 65536.
trans-unit.target: ThreadStackSize -此指令告诉服务器用于单个工作线程的堆栈大小。推荐的默认值为 ThreadStackSize 65536 。

trans-unit.source: MaxThreads - This directive limits the total number of work threads to a maximum value. The recommended default is ThreadsPerChild 250.
trans-unit.target: MaxThreads -此指令将工作线程的总数限制为最大值。推荐的默认值为 ThreadsPerChild 250 。

trans-unit.source: htpasswd will ask you for the password, and then ask you to type it again to confirm it:
trans-unit.target: htpasswd 会要求您输入密码，然后要求您再次输入以确认：

trans-unit.source: <If> can be used to achieve similar results.
trans-unit.target: <If> 可用于获得相似的结果。

trans-unit.source: LimitRequestBody only applies to request bodies that the server will spool to disk
trans-unit.target: LimitRequestBody 仅适用于服务器将后台处理到磁盘的请求正文

trans-unit.source: LogLevel can be used to configure a log level specific to mod_authnz_fcgi. For example:
trans-unit.target: LogLevel 可用于配置特定于mod_authnz_fcgi的日志级别。例如：

trans-unit.source: event is based on the worker MPM, which implements a hybrid multi-process multi-threaded server. A single control process (the parent) is responsible for launching child processes. Each child process creates a fixed number of server threads as specified in the ThreadsPerChild directive, as well as a listener thread which listens for connections and passes them to a worker thread for processing when they arrive.
trans-unit.target: event 基于 worker MPM，该MPM实现了混合多进程多线程服务器。单个控制进程（父进程）负责启动子进程。每个子进程都会创建固定数量的服务器线程（如 ThreadsPerChild 指令中所指定），以及一个侦听器线程，该线程侦听连接并将连接到达时将其传递给工作线程进行处理。
event ， worker ， prefork 的， mpm_winnt ， mpm_netware 差不多， mpmt_os2 的
event ， worker ， prefork 的， mpm_winnt ， mpmt_os2 的

trans-unit.source: <Directory> (except regular expressions) and .htaccess done simultaneously (with .htaccess, if allowed, overriding <Directory>)
trans-unit.target: <Directory> （正则表达式除外）和 .htaccess 同时完成（如果允许，则使用 .htaccess 覆盖 <Directory> ）

trans-unit.source: <Directory> (group 1 above) is processed in the order shortest directory component to longest. For example, <Directory "/var/web/dir"> will be processed before <Directory "/var/web/dir/subdir">.
trans-unit.target: <Directory> （上面的组1）以目录中最短到最长的顺序处理。例如， <Directory "/var/web/dir"> 将被处理之前 <Directory "/var/web/dir/subdir"> 。

trans-unit.source: <IfDefine>, <IfModule>, and the <IfVersion> can apply negative conditions by preceding their test with "!". Also, these sections can be nested to achieve more complex restrictions.
trans-unit.target: <IfDefine> ， <IfModule> 和 <IfVersion> 可以通过在测试之前加“！”来应用否定条件。同样，可以嵌套这些部分以实现更复杂的限制。

trans-unit.source: mod_actions - Maps a request to a CGI script based on the request method, or resource MIME type.
trans-unit.target: mod_actions -根据请求方法或资源MIME类型将请求映射到CGI脚本。

trans-unit.source: <Alias>es on the other hand, are mapped vice-versa:
trans-unit.target: <Alias> 另一方面， <Alias> es被映射，反之亦然：

trans-unit.source: mod_cache and its provider modules mod_cache_disk provide intelligent, HTTP-aware caching. The content itself is stored in the cache, and mod_cache aims to honor all of the various HTTP headers and options that control the cacheability of content as described in Section 13 of RFC2616. mod_cache is aimed at both simple and complex caching configurations, where you are dealing with proxied content, dynamic local content or have a need to speed up access to local files on a potentially slow disk.
trans-unit.target: mod_cache 及其提供程序模块 mod_cache_disk 提供智能的HTTP感知缓存。内容本身存储在缓存中，并且mod_cache旨在遵循 RFC2616的第13节中描述的控制内容的可缓存性的所有各种HTTP标头和选项。 mod_cache 适用于简单和复杂的缓存配置，在这些配置中，您要处理代理内容，动态本地内容，或者需要加快对可能速度较慢的磁盘上的本地文件的访问。

trans-unit.source: mod_cache and its provider modules mod_cache_disk provide intelligent, HTTP-aware caching. The content itself is stored in the cache, and mod_cache aims to honor all of the various HTTP headers and options that control the cacheability of content as described in Section 13 of RFC2616. mod_cache is aimed at both simple and complex caching configurations, where you are dealing with proxied content, dynamic local content or have a need to speed up access to local files on a potentially slow disk.
mod_cache will only serve the cached content to requesters with accept-language and accept-charset headers matching those of the original request.
trans-unit.target: mod_cache 仅将缓存的内容提供给请求者，这些请求者的accept-language和accept-charset标头与原始请求的标头匹配。

trans-unit.source: mod_cache will run before mod_env and, when successful, will deliver the content without it. In that case a cache hit will log -, while a cache miss will log 1.
trans-unit.target: mod_cache 将在 mod_env 之前运行，如果成功，它将在没有内容的情况下交付内容。在这种情况下缓存命中将记录 - ，而高速缓存未命中将记录 1 。

trans-unit.source: CacheDirLevels specifies how many levels of subdirectory there should be, and CacheDirLength specifies how many characters should be in each directory. With the example settings given above, the hash would be turned into a filename prefix as /var/cache/apache/x/y/TGxSMO2b68mBCykqkp1w.
trans-unit.target: CacheDirLevels 指定应该有多少级子目录，而 CacheDirLength 指定每个目录中应有多少个字符。使用上面给出的示例设置，哈希将被转换为文件名前缀 /var/cache/apache/x/y/TGxSMO2b68mBCykqkp1w 。
mod_charset_lite ，在不同字符集之间进行代码转换。

trans-unit.source: mod_dir - Provides basic mapping of a trailing slash into an index file such as index.html.
trans-unit.target: mod_dir -提供斜杠到索引文件（例如 index.html )的基本映射。

trans-unit.source: mod_dir provides FallbackResource, which can be used to map virtual URIs to a real resource, which then serves them. This is a very useful replacement for mod_rewrite when implementing a 'front controller'
trans-unit.target: mod_dir 提供 FallbackResource ，其可用于虚拟的URI映射到真实资源，然后提供它们。在实现“前端控制器”时，这是对 mod_rewrite 的非常有用的替代

trans-unit.source: mod_ext_filter, runs an external program as a filter.
trans-unit.target: mod_ext_filter ，将外部程序作为过滤器运行。

trans-unit.source: mod_file_cache offers the ability to pre-load files into memory on server startup, and can improve access times and save file handles on files that are accessed often, as there is no need to go to disk on each request.
trans-unit.target: mod_file_cache 具有在服务器启动时将文件预加载到内存中的功能，并且可以缩短访问时间并在经常访问的文件上保存文件句柄，因为不需要在每个请求上都进入磁盘。

trans-unit.source: mod_file_cache provides the MMapFile directive, which allows you to have httpd map a static file's contents into memory at start time (using the mmap system call). httpd will use the in-memory contents for all subsequent accesses to this file.
trans-unit.target: mod_file_cache 提供了 MMapFile 指令，它使您可以在开始时使用mmap系统调用将httpd将静态文件的内容映射到内存中。 httpd将使用内存中的内容进行对该文件的所有后续访问。

trans-unit.source: mod_filter, included in Apache 2.1 and later, enables the filter chain to be configured dynamically at run time. So for example you can set up a proxy to rewrite HTML with an HTML filter and JPEG images with a completely separate filter, despite the proxy having no prior information about what the origin server will send. This works by using a filter harness, that dispatches to different providers according to the actual contents at runtime. Any filter may be either inserted directly in the chain and run unconditionally, or used as a provider and inserted dynamically. For example,
trans-unit.target: mod_filter Apache 2.1及更高版本中包含的 mod_filter允许在运行时动态配置过滤器链。因此，例如，您可以设置代理以使用HTML过滤器重写HTML，并使用完全独立的过滤器重写JPEG图像，尽管该代理没有有关原始服务器将发送的内容的事先信息。这是通过使用筛选器工具来实现的，筛选器工具在运行时根据实际内容调度到不同的提供程序。任何过滤器都可以直接插入到链中并无条件运行，也可以用作提供者并动态插入。例如，

trans-unit.source: mod_imagemap - Maps a request to a URL based on where a user clicks on an image embedded in a HTML document.
trans-unit.target: mod_imagemap -根据用户单击HTML文档中嵌入的图像的位置将请求映射到URL。

trans-unit.source: mod_include and mod_negotiation must be enabled to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: mod_include 必须启用 mod_include和 mod_negotiation 才能使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: mod_log_forensic provides for forensic logging of client requests. Logging is done before and after processing a request, so the forensic log contains two log lines for each request. The forensic logger is very strict with no customizations. It can be an invaluable debugging and security tool.
trans-unit.target: mod_log_forensic 提供对客户端请求的取证日志。记录是在处理请求之前和之后完成的，因此取证日志包含每个请求的两条日志行。取证记录器非常严格，没有自定义设置。它可以是宝贵的调试和安全工具。

trans-unit.source: mod_logio adds in two additional LogFormat fields (%I and %O) that log the actual number of bytes received and sent on the network.
trans-unit.target: mod_logio 添加了两个附加的 LogFormat 字段（％I和％O），用于记录网络上实际接收和发送的字节数。

trans-unit.source: mod_negotiation - Selects an appropriate document based on client preferences such as language or content compression.
trans-unit.target: mod_negotiation -根据客户端的首选项（例如语言或内容压缩）选择适当的文档。

trans-unit.source: mod_reflector accepts POST requests from clients, and reflects the content request body received within the POST request back in the response, passing through the output filter stack on the way back to the client.
trans-unit.target: mod_reflector 接受来自客户端的POST请求，并在响应中将POST请求内收到的内容请求主体反映回响应中，并在返回客户端的过程中通过输出筛选器堆栈。

trans-unit.source: prefork, worker, or event, depending on platform capabilities
trans-unit.target: prefork ， worker 或 event ，取决于平台功能

trans-unit.source: mod_alias is designed to handle simple URL manipulation tasks. For more complicated tasks such as manipulating the query string, use the tools provided by mod_rewrite.
trans-unit.target: mod_alias 旨在处理简单的URL操作任务。对于更复杂的任务，例如处理查询字符串，请使用 mod_rewrite 提供的工具。

trans-unit.source: mod_allowmethods was written to replace the rather kludgy implementation of Limit and LimitExcept.
trans-unit.target: mod_allowmethods 编写了 mod_allowmethods来替换 Limit 和 LimitExcept 相当笨拙的实现。

trans-unit.source: mod_auth_digest only works properly on platforms where APR supports shared memory.
trans-unit.target: mod_auth_digest 仅在APR支持共享内存的平台上正常工作。

trans-unit.source: mod_auth_form addresses this by allowing the method and body of the original request to be embedded in the login form. If authentication is successful, the original method and body will be retried by Apache httpd, preserving the state of the original request.
trans-unit.target: mod_auth_form 通过允许将原始请求的方法和主体嵌入到登录表单中来解决此问题。如果身份验证成功，则Apache httpd将重试原始方法和主体，并保留原始请求的状态。

trans-unit.source: mod_authnz_ldap registers both an authn_ldap authentication provider and an authz_ldap authorization handler. The authn_ldap authentication provider can be enabled through the AuthBasicProvider directive using the ldap value. The authz_ldap handler extends the Require directive's authorization types by adding ldap-user, ldap-dn and ldap-group values.
trans-unit.target: mod_authnz_ldap 同时注册authn_ldap身份验证提供程序和authz_ldap授权处理程序。可以使用 ldap 值通过 AuthBasicProvider 指令启用authn_ldap身份验证提供程序。authz_ldap处理程序通过添加 ldap-user ， ldap-dn 和 ldap-group 值来扩展 Require 指令的授权类型。

trans-unit.source: mod_authnz_ldap uses the following directives during the compare phase:
trans-unit.target: mod_authnz_ldap 在比较阶段， mod_authnz_ldap使用以下指令：

trans-unit.source: mod_authz_core provides a high-level interface to authorization that is much easier to use than using into the relevant hooks directly. The first argument to the Require directive gives the name of the responsible authorization provider. For any Require line, mod_authz_core will call the authorization provider of the given name, passing the rest of the line as parameters. The provider will then check authorization and pass the result as return value.
trans-unit.target: mod_authz_core 提供了高级的授权接口，比直接使用相关的挂钩要容易得多。 Require 指令的第一个参数给出负责的授权提供者的名称。对于任何 Require 行， mod_authz_core 将调用给定名称的授权提供程序，并将其余行作为参数传递。然后，提供程序将检查授权并将结果作为返回值传递。

trans-unit.source: mod_authz_core provides some generic authorization providers which can be used with the Require directive.
trans-unit.target: mod_authz_core 提供了一些可以与 Require 指令一起使用的通用授权提供程序。

trans-unit.source: mod_autoindex works correctly. Since it doesn't emit the path in the link, it would point to the wrong path.
trans-unit.target: mod_autoindex 正常工作。由于它不会发出链接中的路径，因此它将指向错误的路径。

trans-unit.source: mod_cache implements an RFC 2616 compliant HTTP content caching filter, with support for the caching of content negotiated responses containing the Vary header.
trans-unit.target: mod_cache 实现了符合 RFC 2616的HTTP内容缓存过滤器，并支持缓存包含Vary标头的内容协商响应。

trans-unit.source: mod_cache implements an RFC 2616 compliant HTTP content caching filter, with support for the caching of content negotiated responses containing the Vary header.
mod_cache requires the services of one or more storage management modules. The following storage management modules are included in the base Apache distribution:
trans-unit.target: mod_cache 需要一个或多个存储管理模块的服务。基本的Apache发行版中包含以下存储管理模块：

trans-unit.source: mod_cache_disk implements a disk based storage manager for mod_cache.
trans-unit.target: mod_cache_disk 实现了一个基于磁盘的存储管理器 mod_cache 的。

trans-unit.source: mod_cache_disk requires the services of mod_cache, which must be loaded before mod_cache_disk.
trans-unit.target: mod_cache_disk 需要的服务 mod_cache 的，必须mod_cache_disk之前加载。

trans-unit.source: mod_cache_disk uses the sendfile feature to serve files from the cache when supported by the platform, and when enabled with EnableSendfile. However, per-directory and .htaccess configuration of EnableSendfile are ignored by mod_cache_disk as the corresponding settings are not available to the module when a request is being served from the cache.
trans-unit.target: mod_cache_disk 当平台支持并启用 EnableSendfile 时， mod_cache_disk使用sendfile功能从缓存中提供文件。但是， mod_cache_disk 会忽略 EnableSendfile 的按目录和.htaccess配置，因为当从缓存中处理请求时，相应的设置对模块不可用。

trans-unit.source: mod_cache_socache implements a shared object cache (socache) based storage manager for mod_cache.
trans-unit.target: mod_cache_socache 器具为共享对象的高速缓存（socache）基于存储管理器 mod_cache 的。

trans-unit.source: mod_cache_socache requires the services of mod_cache, which must be loaded before mod_cache_socache.
trans-unit.target: mod_cache_socache 需要的服务 mod_cache 的，它必须之前加载 mod_cache_socache 。

trans-unit.source: mod_charset_lite allows the server to change the character set of responses before sending them to the client. In an EBCDIC environment, Apache always translates HTTP protocol content (e.g. response headers) from the code page of the Apache process locale to ISO-8859-1, but not the body of responses. In any environment, mod_charset_lite can be used to specify that response bodies should be translated. For example, if files are stored in EBCDIC, then mod_charset_lite can translate them to ISO-8859-1 before sending them to the client.
trans-unit.target: mod_charset_lite 允许服务器在将响应发送给客户端之前更改响应的字符集。在EBCDIC环境中，Apache始终将HTTP协议内容（例如，响应标头）从Apache进程语言环境的代码页转换为ISO-8859-1，而不是转换响应的主体。在任何环境中， mod_charset_lite 均可用于指定应翻译响应主体。例如，如果文件存储在EBCDIC中，则 mod_charset_lite 可以在将文件发送到客户端之前将它们转换为ISO-8859-1。

trans-unit.source: mod_dav may be subject to various kinds of denial-of-service attacks. The LimitXMLRequestBody directive can be used to limit the amount of memory consumed in parsing large DAV requests. The DavDepthInfinity directive can be used to prevent PROPFIND requests on a very large repository from consuming large amounts of memory. Another possible denial-of-service attack involves a client simply filling up all available disk space with many large files. There is no direct way to prevent this in Apache, so you should avoid giving DAV access to untrusted users.
trans-unit.target: mod_dav 可能会遭受各种拒绝服务攻击。该 LimitXMLRequestBody 指令可用于限制大解析请求DAV占用的内存量。该 DavDepthInfinity 指令可以用来防止 PROPFIND 一个非常大的存储库请求从消耗大量的内存。另一种可能的拒绝服务攻击涉及客户端简单地用许多大文件填充所有可用磁盘空间。在Apache中，没有直接的方法可以阻止这种情况，因此您应避免将DAV访问权限授予不受信任的用户。

trans-unit.source: mod_dbd exports five functions for other modules to use. The API is as follows:
trans-unit.target: mod_dbd 导出五个函数供其他模块使用。API如下：

trans-unit.source: mod_dbd manages SQL database connections using APR. It provides database connections on request to modules requiring SQL database functions, and takes care of managing databases with optimal efficiency and scalability for both threaded and non-threaded MPMs. For details, see the APR website and this overview of the Apache DBD Framework by its original developer.
trans-unit.target: mod_dbd 使用 APR管理SQL数据库连接。它根据需要提供与需要SQL数据库功能的模块的数据库连接，并以最佳效率和可伸缩性管理线程和非线程MPM的数据库。有关详细信息，请参见 APR网站和原始开发人员对 Apache DBD Framework的概述。

trans-unit.source: mod_dbd manages SQL database connections using APR. It provides database connections on request to modules requiring SQL database functions, and takes care of managing databases with optimal efficiency and scalability for both threaded and non-threaded MPMs. For details, see the APR website and this overview of the Apache DBD Framework by its original developer.

mod_dbd supports SQL prepared statements on behalf of modules that may wish to use them. Each prepared statement must be assigned a name (label), and they are stored in a hash: the prepared field of an ap_dbd_t. Hash entries are of type apr_dbd_prepared_t and can be used in any of the apr_dbd prepared statement SQL query or select commands.
trans-unit.target: mod_dbd 代表可能希望使用它们的模块支持SQL预准备语句。每个准备好的声明中必须指定一个名称（标签），并将它们存储在哈希：在 prepared 一个领域 ap_dbd_t 。哈希条目的类型为 apr_dbd_prepared_t ，可以在任何apr_dbd准备语句SQL查询或选择命令中使用。

trans-unit.source: mod_ext_filter presents a simple and familiar programming model for filters. With this module, a program which reads from stdin and writes to stdout (i.e., a Unix-style filter command) can be a filter for Apache. This filtering mechanism is much slower than using a filter which is specially written for the Apache API and runs inside of the Apache server process, but it does have the following benefits:
trans-unit.target: mod_ext_filter 为过滤器提供了一个简单而熟悉的编程模型。使用此模块，从stdin读取并写入stdout的程序（即Unix样式的filter命令）可以成为Apache的过滤器。这种过滤机制比使用专门为Apache API编写并在Apache服务器进程内部运行的过滤器要慢得多，但是它确实具有以下好处：

trans-unit.source: mod_file_cache caches a list of statically configured files via MMapFile or CacheFile directives in the main server configuration.
trans-unit.target: mod_file_cache 通过主服务器配置中的 MMapFile 或 CacheFile 指令缓存静态配置文件列表。

trans-unit.source: mod_filter aims to offer generic handling of these details of filter implementation, reducing the complexity required of content filter modules. This is work-in-progress; the FilterProtocol implements some of this functionality for back-compatibility with Apache 2.0 modules. For httpd 2.1 and later, the ap_register_output_filter_protocol and ap_filter_protocol API enables filter modules to declare their own behaviour.
trans-unit.target: mod_filter 旨在为过滤器实现的这些细节提供通用处理，从而降低内容过滤器模块所需的复杂性。这是正在进行的工作；所述 FilterProtocol 实现了一些的此功能对于与Apache 2.0模块向后兼容性。对于httpd 2.1及更高版本， ap_register_output_filter_protocol 和 ap_filter_protocol API使过滤器模块可以声明自己的行为。

trans-unit.source: mod_filter by contrast gives server administrators a great deal of flexibility in configuring the filter chain. In fact, filters can be inserted based on complex boolean expressions This generalises the limited flexibility offered by AddOutputFilterByType.
trans-unit.target: mod_filter 相反， mod_filter在配置过滤器链时为服务器管理员提供了很大的灵活性。实际上，可以基于复杂的布尔表达式插入过滤器。这概括了 AddOutputFilterByType 提供的有限的灵活性。

trans-unit.source: mod_filter will record buckets and brigades passing through the filter to the error log, before the provider has processed them. This is similar to the information generated by mod_diagnostics.
trans-unit.target: mod_filter 在提供程序处理它们之前， mod_filter将记录通过过滤器到达错误日志的存储桶和旅。这类似于 mod_diagnostics生成的信息。

trans-unit.source: mod_filter works by introducing indirection into the filter chain. Instead of inserting filters in the chain, we insert a filter harness which in turn dispatches conditionally to a filter provider. Any content filter may be used as a provider to mod_filter; no change to existing filter modules is required (although it may be possible to simplify them).
trans-unit.target: mod_filter 通过将间接引入过滤器链来工作。我们没有在链中插入过滤器，而是插入了过滤器线束，后者又有条件地分派给过滤器提供程序。任何内容过滤器都可以用作 mod_filter 的提供者；无需更改现有的过滤器模块（尽管可以简化它们）。

trans-unit.source: mod_filter works by introducing indirection into the filter chain. Instead of inserting filters in the chain, we insert a filter harness which in turn dispatches conditionally to a filter provider. Any content filter may be used as a provider to mod_filter; no change to existing filter modules is required (although it may be possible to simplify them). There can be multiple providers for one filter, but no more than one provider will run for any single request.
trans-unit.target: mod_filter 通过将间接引入过滤器链来工作。我们没有在链中插入过滤器，而是插入了过滤器线束，后者又有条件地分派给过滤器提供程序。任何内容过滤器都可以用作 mod_filter 的提供者；无需更改现有的过滤器模块（尽管可以简化它们）。一个过滤器可以有多个提供程序，但对于单个请求，最多只能运行一个提供程序。

trans-unit.source: mod_headers can be applied either early or late in the request. The normal mode is late, when Request Headers are set immediately before running the content generator and Response Headers just as the response is sent down the wire. Always use Late mode in an operational server.
trans-unit.target: mod_headers 可以在请求的早期或晚期应用。正常模式已晚，当在运行内容生成器和响应标头之前立即设置请求标头时，就像响应是通过有线发送一样。始终在可运行的服务器中使用“后期”模式。

trans-unit.source: mod_heartbeat itself is loaded on the origin server(s) that serve requests through the proxy server(s).
trans-unit.target: mod_heartbeat 本身已加载到通过代理服务器处理请求的原始服务器上。

trans-unit.source: mod_heartbeat sends multicast messages to a mod_heartmonitor listener that advertises the servers current connection count. Usually, mod_heartmonitor will be running on a proxy server with mod_lbmethod_heartbeat loaded, which allows ProxyPass to use the "heartbeat" lbmethod inside of ProxyPass.
trans-unit.target: mod_heartbeat 将多播消息发送到 mod_heartmonitor 侦听器，该侦听器通告服务器当前的连接数。通常情况下， mod_heartmonitor 将与代理服务器上运行 mod_lbmethod_heartbeat 加载，它允许 ProxyPass 使用“心跳” lbmethod内 ProxyPass 。

trans-unit.source: mod_heartmonitor listens for server status messages generated by mod_heartbeat enabled origin servers and makes their status available to mod_lbmethod_heartbeat. This allows ProxyPass to use the "heartbeat" lbmethod inside of ProxyPass.
trans-unit.target: mod_heartmonitor 侦听启用了 mod_heartbeat 的原始服务器生成的服务器状态消息，并将其状态提供给 mod_lbmethod_heartbeat 。这允许 ProxyPass 使用 ProxyPass 内部的“心跳” lbmethod。

trans-unit.source: mod_info provides its information by reading the parsed configuration, rather than reading the original configuration file. There are a few limitations as a result of the way the parsed configuration tree is created:
trans-unit.target: mod_info 通过读取已解析的配置而不是读取原始配置文件来提供其信息。由于创建了解析的配置树，因此存在一些限制：

trans-unit.source: mod_ldap has a content handler that allows administrators to monitor the cache performance. The name of the content handler is ldap-status, so the following directives could be used to access the mod_ldap cache information:
trans-unit.target: mod_ldap 具有内容处理程序，管理员可以使用该内容处理程序监视缓存性能。内容处理程序的名称为 ldap-status ，因此可以使用以下指令访问 mod_ldap 缓存信息：

trans-unit.source: mod_ldap stores the username, the DN retrieved, the password used to bind, and the time of the bind in the cache. Whenever a new connection is initiated with the same username, mod_ldap compares the password of the new connection with the password in the cache. If the passwords match, and if the cached entry is not too old, mod_ldap bypasses the search/bind phase.
trans-unit.target: mod_ldap 在缓存中存储用户名，检索到的DN，用于绑定的密码以及绑定时间。每当使用相同的用户名启动新连接时， mod_ldap 都会将新连接的密码与缓存中的密码进行比较。如果密码匹配，并且高速缓存的条目不太旧，则 mod_ldap 将绕过搜索/绑定阶段。

trans-unit.source: mod_ldap supports two types of LDAP caching during the search/bind phase with a search/bind cache and during the compare phase with two operation caches. Each LDAP URL that is used by the server has its own set of these three caches.
trans-unit.target: mod_ldap 在搜索/绑定阶段使用搜索/绑定缓存以及在比较阶段使用两个操作缓存支持两种类型的LDAP缓存。服务器使用的每个LDAP URL都有自己的这三个高速缓存集。

trans-unit.source: mod_md will look at your server configuration and try to figure out which of those are available. Then it can select the proper ACME challenge to create a certificate for your site.
trans-unit.target: mod_md 将查看您的服务器配置，并尝试找出其中哪些可用。然后，它可以选择适当的ACME挑战来为您的站点创建证书。

trans-unit.source: mod_privileges introduces new security concerns in situations where untrusted code may be run within the webserver process. This applies to untrusted modules, and scripts running under modules such as mod_php or mod_perl. Scripts running externally (e.g. as CGI or in an appserver behind mod_proxy or mod_jk) are NOT affected.
trans-unit.target: mod_privileges 在网络服务器进程中可能运行不受信任的代码的情况下， mod_privileges引入了新的安全问题。这适用于不受信任的模块，以及在诸如mod_php或mod_perl之类的模块下运行的脚本。外部运行的脚本（例如，作为CGI或在mod_proxy或mod_jk之后的应用服务器中运行）不受影响。

trans-unit.source: mod_privileges raises security issues similar to those of suexec. But unlike suexec, it applies not only to CGI programs but to the entire request processing cycle, including in-process applications and subprocesses. It is ideally suited to running PHP applications under mod_php, which is also incompatible with threaded MPMs. It is also well-suited to other in-process scripting applications such as mod_perl, mod_python, and mod_ruby, and to applications implemented in C as apache modules where privilege separation is an issue.
trans-unit.target: mod_privileges 引发了类似于 suexec的安全问题。但是与suexec不同，它不仅适用于CGI程序，而且适用于整个请求处理周期，包括进程内应用程序和子进程。它非常适合在 mod_php下运行PHP应用程序，后者也与线程MPM不兼容。它也非常适合其他进程内脚本应用程序（例如 mod_perl， mod_python和 mod_ruby），以及以C语言作为apache模块实现的应用程序，其中特权分离是一个问题。

trans-unit.source: mod_proxy and related modules implement a proxy/gateway for Apache HTTP Server, supporting a number of popular protocols as well as several different load balancing algorithms. Third-party modules can add support for additional protocols and load balancing algorithms.
trans-unit.target: mod_proxy 和相关模块为Apache HTTP Server实现代理/网关，支持许多流行的协议以及几种不同的负载平衡算法。第三方模块可以增加对其他协议和负载平衡算法的支持。
mod_proxy 扩展，用于 CONNECT 请求处理
mod_proxy 扩展以实现负载平衡

trans-unit.source: mod_proxy, which provides basic proxy capabilities

ProxyPassReverse modifies any Location (redirect) headers that are sent by the back-end server, and, in this example, Substitute takes care of the rest of the problem by fixing up the HTML response as well.
trans-unit.target: ProxyPassReverse 修改后端服务器发送的任何 Location （重定向）标头，在此示例中， Substitute 还通过修复HTML响应来解决其余问题。

trans-unit.source: mod_proxy_balancer and one or more balancer modules if load balancing is required. (See mod_proxy_balancer for more information.)
trans-unit.target: mod_proxy_balancer 如果需要负载平衡，则为 mod_proxy_balancer和一个或多个平衡器模块。（有关更多信息，请参见 mod_proxy_balancer 。）

trans-unit.source: mod_proxy_connect creates the following request notes for logging using the %{VARNAME}n format in LogFormat or ErrorLogFormat:
trans-unit.target: mod_proxy_connect 使用 %{VARNAME}n 格式（ LogFormat 或 ErrorLogFormat )创建以下请求记录日志：

trans-unit.source: mod_proxy_fcgi disables connection reuse by default, so after a request has been completed the connection will NOT be held open by that httpd child process and won't be reused. If the FastCGI application is able to handle concurrent connections from httpd, you can opt-in to connection reuse as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: mod_proxy_fcgi 默认情况下， mod_proxy_fcgi禁用连接重用，因此在请求完成后，该httpd子进程不会将连接保持打开状态，并且将不会重用该连接。如果FastCGI应用程序能够处理来自httpd的并发连接，则可以选择加入连接重用，如以下示例所示：

trans-unit.source: mod_proxy_http creates the following request notes for logging using the %{VARNAME}n format in LogFormat or ErrorLogFormat:
trans-unit.target: mod_proxy_http 使用 %{VARNAME}n 格式（ LogFormat 或 ErrorLogFormat )创建以下请求记录日志：

trans-unit.source: mod_proxy_http2 supports HTTP/2 only, it does not provide any downgrades to HTTP/1.1. This means that the backend needs to support HTTP/2 because HTTP/1.1 will not be used instead.
trans-unit.target: mod_proxy_http2 仅支持HTTP / 2，不提供对HTTP / 1.1的任何降级。这意味着后端需要支持HTTP / 2，因为将不使用HTTP / 1.1。

trans-unit.source: mod_proxy_http2 works with incoming fronted requests using HTTP/1.1 or HTTP/2. In both cases, requests proxied to the same backend are sent over a single TCP connection whenever possible (namely when the connection can be re-used).
trans-unit.target: mod_proxy_http2 使用HTTP / 1.1或HTTP / 2处理传入的前端请求。在这两种情况下，都尽可能通过单个TCP连接发送代理到同一后端的请求（即，何时可以重新使用该连接）。

trans-unit.source: mod_proxy_scgi does the same as mod_cgi in this regard, except that you can turn off the feature or specify the use of a header other than Location.
trans-unit.target: mod_proxy_scgi 在这方面， mod_proxy_scgi与 mod_cgi 相同，除了可以关闭功能或指定使用 Location 以外的标头。

trans-unit.source: mod_rewrite offers detailed logging of its actions at the trace1 to trace8 log levels. The log level can be set specifically for mod_rewrite using the LogLevel directive: Up to level debug, no actions are logged, while trace8 means that practically all actions are logged.
trans-unit.target: mod_rewrite 在 trace1 到 trace8 日志级别提供其操作的详细日志记录。可以使用 LogLevel 指令专门为 mod_rewrite 设置日志级别：直到 debug 级别，没有任何操作被记录，而 trace8 意味着实际上记录了所有操作。

trans-unit.source: mod_rewrite operates on the full URL path, including the path-info section. A rewrite rule can be invoked in httpd.conf or in .htaccess. The path generated by a rewrite rule can include a query string, or can lead to internal sub-processing, external request redirection, or internal proxy throughput.
trans-unit.target: mod_rewrite 在完整的URL路径（包括path-info部分）上运行。可以在 httpd.conf 或 .htaccess 中调用重写规则。重写规则生成的路径可以包含查询字符串，或者可以导致内部子处理，外部请求重定向或内部代理吞吐量。

trans-unit.source: mod_rewrite provides a flexible and powerful way to manipulate URLs using an unlimited number of rules. Each rule can have an unlimited number of attached rule conditions, to allow you to rewrite URL based on server variables, environment variables, HTTP headers, or time stamps.
trans-unit.target: mod_rewrite 提供了一种灵活而强大的方法，可以使用无限数量的规则来操作URL。每个规则可以具有无限数量的附加规则条件，以允许您基于服务器变量，环境变量，HTTP标头或时间戳重写URL。

trans-unit.source: mod_sed is an in-process content filter. The mod_sed filter implements the sed editing commands implemented by the Solaris 10 sed program as described in the manual page. However, unlike sed, mod_sed doesn't take data from standard input. Instead, the filter acts on the entity data sent between client and server. mod_sed can be used as an input or output filter. mod_sed is a content filter, which means that it cannot be used to modify client or server http headers.
trans-unit.target: mod_sed 是进程内内容过滤器。所述 mod_sed 滤波器实现 sed 编辑由Solaris 10实现命令 sed 如在所描述的程序手册页。但是，与 sed 不同， mod_sed 不会从标准输入中获取数据。而是，筛选器作用于在客户端和服务器之间发送的实体数据。 mod_sed 可用作输入或输出过滤器。 mod_sed 是内容过滤器，这意味着它不能用于修改客户端或服务器的HTTP标头。

trans-unit.source: mod_sed is an in-process content filter. The mod_sed filter implements the sed editing commands implemented by the Solaris 10 sed program as described in the manual page. However, unlike sed, mod_sed doesn't take data from standard input. Instead, the filter acts on the entity data sent between client and server. mod_sed can be used as an input or output filter. mod_sed is a content filter, which means that it cannot be used to modify client or server http headers.
mod_slotmem_plain is a memory provider which provides for creation and access to a plain memory segment in which the datasets are organized in "slots."
trans-unit.target: mod_slotmem_plain 是一种内存提供程序，用于创建和访问纯数据段，在该段中，数据集以“插槽”形式组织。

trans-unit.source: mod_slotmem_shm is a memory provider which provides for creation and access to a shared memory segment in which the datasets are organized in "slots."
trans-unit.target: mod_slotmem_shm 是一个内存提供程序，用于创建和访问共享的内存段，在该内存段中，数据集以“插槽”的形式组织。

trans-unit.source: mod_socache_dc is a shared object cache provider which provides for creation and access to a cache backed by the distcache distributed session caching libraries.
trans-unit.target: mod_socache_dc 是共享对象缓存提供程序，它提供创建和访问由 distcache分布式会话缓存库支持的缓存的功能。

trans-unit.source: mod_ssl provides a few authentication providers for use with mod_authz_core's Require directive.
trans-unit.target: mod_ssl 提供了一些身份验证提供程序，可与 mod_authz_core 的 Require 指令一起使用。

trans-unit.source: mod_ssl sets "notes" for the request which can be used in logging with the %{name}n format string in mod_log_config.
trans-unit.target: mod_ssl 为请求设置“注释”，可在 mod_log_config 中使用 %{name}n 格式字符串在日志中使用。

trans-unit.source: mod_substitute provides a mechanism to perform both regular expression and fixed string substitutions on response bodies.
trans-unit.target: mod_substitute 提供了一种在响应主体上执行正则表达式和固定字符串替换的机制。

trans-unit.source: mod_unique_id is no longer required since version 2.1
trans-unit.target: mod_unique_id 从2.1版开始，不再需要 mod_unique_id

trans-unit.source: mod_usertrack sets a cookie which can be logged via mod_log_config configurable logging formats:
trans-unit.target: mod_usertrack 设置一个cookie，该cookie可以通过 mod_log_config 可配置的日志记录格式进行记录：

trans-unit.source: mod_watchdog defines programmatic hooks for other modules to periodically run tasks. These modules can register handlers for mod_watchdog hooks. Currently, the following modules in the Apache distribution use this functionality:
trans-unit.target: mod_watchdog 定义其他模块的编程挂钩，以定期运行任务。这些模块可以为 mod_watchdog 挂钩注册处理程序。当前，Apache发行版中的以下模块使用此功能：

trans-unit.source: MaxConnectionsPerChild controls how frequently the server recycles processes by killing old ones and launching new ones.
trans-unit.target: MaxConnectionsPerChild 通过杀死旧进程并启动新进程来控制服务器回收进程的频率。

trans-unit.source: MaxConnectionsPerChild controls how frequently the server recycles processes by killing old ones and launching new ones. On the NetWare OS it is highly recommended that this directive remain set to 0. This allows worker threads to continue servicing requests indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: MaxConnectionsPerChild 通过杀死旧进程并启动新进程来控制服务器回收进程的频率。在NetWare OS上，强烈建议将此指令设置为0。这允许工作线程无限期地继续处理请求。

trans-unit.source: MaxRequestWorkers was called MaxClients prior to version 2.3.13. The above value shows that the old name did not accurately describe its meaning for the event MPM.
trans-unit.target: MaxRequestWorkers 在版本2.3.13之前， MaxRequestWorkers被称为 MaxClients 。上面的值表明，旧名称未正确描述事件MPM的含义。

trans-unit.source: mpm_netware uses a default of MinSpareThreads 10 and, since it is a single-process MPM, tracks this on a server-wide bases.
trans-unit.target: mpm_netware 使用默认的 MinSpareThreads 10 ,并且由于它是单进程MPM，因此将在服务器范围内对其进行跟踪。

trans-unit.source: mpm_netware wants the value to be greater than MinSpareThreads.
mpmt_os2 works similar to mpm_netware. For mpmt_os2 the default value is 10.
trans-unit.target: mpmt_os2 的工作方式类似于 mpm_netware 。对于 mpmt_os2 ，默认值为 10 。

trans-unit.source: mpmt_os2 works similar to mpm_netware. For mpmt_os2 the default value is 5.
trans-unit.target: mpmt_os2 的工作方式类似于 mpm_netware 。对于 mpmt_os2 ，默认值为 5 。

trans-unit.source: worker and event use a default of MinSpareThreads 75 and deal with idle threads on a server-wide basis. If there aren't enough idle threads in the server then child processes are created until the number of idle threads is greater than number. Additional processes/threads might be created if ListenCoresBucketsRatio is enabled.
trans-unit.target: worker 和 event 使用默认值 MinSpareThreads 75 并在服务器范围内处理空闲线程。如果服务器中没有足够的空闲线程，则将创建子进程，直到空闲线程的数量大于 number 为止。如果启用 ListenCoresBucketsRatio ,则可能会创建其他进程/线程。

trans-unit.source: AcceptFilter is implemented in the MPM and has a different type of control over handling of new connections. (Refer to the AcceptFilter documentation for details.)
trans-unit.target: AcceptFilter 在MPM中实现，对新连接的处理具有不同类型的控制。（有关详细信息，请参阅 AcceptFilter 文档。）

trans-unit.source: AddAlt provides the alternate text to display for a file, instead of an icon, for FancyIndexing. File is a file extension, partial filename, wild-card expression or full filename for files to describe. If String contains any whitespace, you have to enclose it in quotes (" or '). This alternate text is displayed if the client is image-incapable, has image loading disabled, or fails to retrieve the icon.
trans-unit.target: AddAlt 提供替代文本显示为一个文件，而不是的图标，用于 FancyIndexing 。 File 是文件扩展名，部分文件名，通配符表达式或完整文件名，用于描述文件。如果 String 包含任何空格，则必须将其用引号（ " 或 ' ）括起来。如果客户端无法使用图像，禁用了图像加载或无法检索图标，则会显示此备用文本。

trans-unit.source: AddAltByEncoding provides the alternate text to display for a file, instead of an icon, for FancyIndexing. MIME-encoding is a valid content-encoding, such as x-compress. If String contains any whitespace, you have to enclose it in quotes (" or '). This alternate text is displayed if the client is image-incapable, has image loading disabled, or fails to retrieve the icon.
trans-unit.target: AddAltByEncoding 提供替代文本显示为一个文件，而不是的图标，用于 FancyIndexing 。 MIME-encoding 是有效的内容编码，例如 x-compress 。如果 String 包含任何空格，则必须将其用引号（ " 或 ' ）括起来。如果客户端无法使用图像，禁用了图像加载或无法检索图标，则会显示此备用文本。

trans-unit.source: AddAltByType sets the alternate text to display for a file, instead of an icon, for FancyIndexing. MIME-type is a valid content-type, such as text/html. If String contains any whitespace, you have to enclose it in quotes (" or '). This alternate text is displayed if the client is image-incapable, has image loading disabled, or fails to retrieve the icon.
trans-unit.target: AddAltByType 设置要为文件显示的替代文本，而不是为 FancyIndexing 显示图标。 MIME-type 是有效的内容类型，例如 text/html 。如果 String 包含任何空格，则必须将其用引号（ " 或 ' ）括起来。如果客户端无法使用图像，禁用了图像加载或无法检索图标，则会显示此备用文本。

trans-unit.source: AddDefaultCharset should only be used when all of the text resources to which it applies are known to be in that character encoding and it is too inconvenient to label their charset individually. One such example is to add the charset parameter to resources containing generated content, such as legacy CGI scripts, that might be vulnerable to cross-site scripting attacks due to user-provided data being included in the output. Note, however, that a better solution is to just fix (or delete) those scripts, since setting a default charset does not protect users that have enabled the "auto-detect character encoding" feature on their browser.
trans-unit.target: AddDefaultCharset 仅当已知所应用的所有文本资源都在该字符编码中并且不方便单独标记其字符集时，才应使用AddDefaultCharset。一个这样的示例是将charset参数添加到包含生成的内容的资源（例如旧版CGI脚本），由于输出中包含用户提供的数据，这些资源可能容易​​受到跨站点脚本攻击。但是请注意，更好的解决方案是仅修复（或删除）这些脚本，因为设置默认字符集不会保护在浏览器中启用“自动检测字符编码”功能的用户。

trans-unit.source: AddInputFilter maps the filename extension extension to the filters which will process client requests and POST input when they are received by the server. This is in addition to any filters defined elsewhere, including the SetInputFilter directive. This mapping is merged over any already in force, overriding any mappings that already exist for the same extension.
trans-unit.target: AddInputFilter 将文件名 extension 名扩展名映射到过滤器，这些过滤器将在服务器收到客户端请求和POST输入时处理它们。这是在其他地方定义的任何过滤器的补充，包括 SetInputFilter 指令。该映射将合并到所有已生效的映射上，从而覆盖同一 extension 已存在的所有映射。

trans-unit.source: AllowOverride is valid only in <Directory> sections specified without regular expressions, not in <Location>, <DirectoryMatch> or <Files> sections.
trans-unit.target: AllowOverride 仅在指定的不带正则表达式的 <Directory> 部分中有效，而在 <Location> ， <DirectoryMatch> 或 <Files> 部分中无效。

trans-unit.source: AllowOverrideList is valid only in <Directory> sections specified without regular expressions, not in <Location>, <DirectoryMatch> or <Files> sections.
trans-unit.target: AllowOverrideList 仅在未指定正则表达式的 <Directory> 部分中有效，而在 <Location> ， <DirectoryMatch> 或 <Files> 部分中无效。
AsyncRequestWorkerFactor 可以采用非整数参数，例如“ 1.5”。

trans-unit.source: C=D sorts the directory by description, then file name
trans-unit.target: C=D 按描述对目录进行排序，然后按文件名排序

trans-unit.source: C=M sorts the directory by last-modified date, then file name
trans-unit.target: C=M 按最后修改日期对目录进行排序，然后按文件名排序

trans-unit.source: C=N sorts the directory by file name
trans-unit.target: C=N 按文件名对目录进行排序

trans-unit.source: C=S sorts the directory by size, then file name
trans-unit.target: C=S 按大小排序目录，然后按文件名排序

trans-unit.source: CGIPassAuth allows scripts access to HTTP authorization headers such as Authorization, which is required for scripts that implement HTTP Basic authentication. Normally these HTTP headers are hidden from scripts. This is to disallow scripts from seeing user ids and passwords used to access the server when HTTP Basic authentication is enabled in the web server. This directive should be used when scripts are allowed to implement HTTP Basic authentication.
trans-unit.target: CGIPassAuth 允许脚本访问HTTP授权标头，例如 Authorization ，这是实现HTTP Basic身份验证的脚本所必需的。通常，这些HTTP标头是从脚本中隐藏的。这是为了防止脚本在Web服务器中启用HTTP基本身份验证时看到用于访问服务器的用户ID和密码。当允许脚本实现HTTP Basic身份验证时，应使用此伪指令。

trans-unit.source: CacheIgnoreHeaders specifies additional HTTP headers that should not to be stored in the cache. For example, it makes sense in some cases to prevent cookies from being stored in the cache.
trans-unit.target: CacheIgnoreHeaders 指定不应存储在高速缓存中的其他HTTP标头。例如，在某些情况下，防止cookie被存储在缓存中是有意义的。

trans-unit.source: CacheIgnoreHeaders takes a space separated list of HTTP headers that should not be stored in the cache. If only hop-by-hop headers not should be stored in the cache (the RFC 2616 compliant behaviour), CacheIgnoreHeaders can be set to None.
trans-unit.target: CacheIgnoreHeaders 采用空格分隔的HTTP标头列表，不应将其存储在缓存中。如果不应仅将逐跳标头存储在高速缓存中（符合RFC 2616的行为），则 CacheIgnoreHeaders 可以设置为 None 。

trans-unit.source: CacheIgnoreURLSessionIdentifiers None clears the list of ignored identifiers. Otherwise, each identifier is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: CacheIgnoreURLSessionIdentifiers None 清除忽略的标识符列表。否则，每个标识符将添加到列表中。

trans-unit.source: Content-MD5 is only sent for documents served by the core, and not by any module. For example, SSI documents, output from CGI scripts, and byte range responses do not have this header.
trans-unit.target: Content-MD5 仅针对 core 提供的文档发送Content-MD5，而不发送任何模块提供的文档。例如，SSI文档，CGI脚本的输出以及字节范围响应都没有此标头。

trans-unit.source: CoreDumpDirectory processing only occurs for a select set of fatal signals: SIGFPE, SIGILL, SIGABORT, SIGSEGV, and SIGBUS.
trans-unit.target: CoreDumpDirectory 处理仅针对一组致命信号进行：SIGFPE，SIGILL，SIGABORT，SIGSEGV和SIGBUS。

trans-unit.source: DefaultType None is only available in httpd-2.2.7 and later.
trans-unit.target: DefaultType None 仅在httpd-2.2.7和更高版本中可用。

trans-unit.source: DescriptionWidth=* grows the column to the width necessary to accommodate the longest description string. See the section on AddDescription for dangers inherent in truncating descriptions.
trans-unit.target: DescriptionWidth=* 将列增长到容纳最长描述字符串所需的宽度。请参见 AddDescription 一节以了解截断描述所固有的危险。

trans-unit.source: DescriptionWidth=n fixes the column width to n bytes wide.
trans-unit.target: DescriptionWidth=n 将列宽固定为 n 个字节宽。

trans-unit.source: Directory "/" matches and an initial configuration to set the CustomHeaderName header with the value one is created.
trans-unit.target: Directory “ /”匹配，并创建了一个初始配置，以将 CustomHeaderName 标头设置为值 one 。

trans-unit.source: Directory "/example" matches, and since mod_headers specifies in its code to override in case of a merge, a new configuration is created to set the CustomHeaderName header with the value two.
trans-unit.target: Directory “ / example”匹配，并且由于 mod_headers 在其代码中指定了在合并的情况下要覆盖的内容，因此将创建新配置以将 CustomHeaderName 标头设置为值 two 。

trans-unit.source: ErrorLogFormat allows to specify what supplementary information is logged in the error log in addition to the actual log message.
trans-unit.target: ErrorLogFormat 允许指定除实际日志消息外，在错误日志中记录了哪些补充信息。

trans-unit.source: F=0 formats the listing as a simple list (not FancyIndexed)
trans-unit.target: F=0 将列表格式化为简单列表（未设置FancyIndexed）

trans-unit.source: F=1 formats the listing as a FancyIndexed list
F=2 formats the listing as an HTMLTable FancyIndexed list
trans-unit.target: F=2 将列表格式化为HTMLTable FancyIndexed列表

trans-unit.source: FilesMatch ".*" matches and another merge opportunity arises, causing the CustomHeaderName header to be set with the value three.
trans-unit.target: FilesMatch “。*”匹配，并且出现另一个合并机会，从而导致 CustomHeaderName 标头设置为值 three 。

trans-unit.source: ForceLanguagePriority Fallback uses LanguagePriority to serve a valid result, rather than returning an HTTP result 406 (NOT ACCEPTABLE). If the directives below were given, and the user's Accept-Language only permitted an es language response, but such a variant isn't found, then the first variant from the LanguagePriority list below will be served.
trans-unit.target: ForceLanguagePriority Fallback 使用 LanguagePriority 来提供有效结果，而不是返回HTTP结果406（无法接受）。如果给出了以下指令，并且用户的 Accept-Language 仅允许 es 语言响应，但未找到这样的变体，则将提供下面 LanguagePriority 列表中的第一个变体。

trans-unit.source: ForceLanguagePriority Prefer uses LanguagePriority to serve a one valid result, rather than returning an HTTP result 300 (MULTIPLE CHOICES) when there are several equally valid choices. If the directives below were given, and the user's Accept-Language header assigned en and de each as quality .500 (equally acceptable) then the first matching variant, en, will be served.
trans-unit.target: ForceLanguagePriority Prefer 使用 LanguagePriority 来提供一个有效结果，而不是在存在多个同等有效选择时不返回HTTP结果300（MULTIPLE CHOICES）。如果给出了以下指示，并且用户的 Accept-Language 标头将 en 和 de 分别指定为质量 .500 （同样可以接受），则将提供第一个匹配的变体 en 。

trans-unit.source: GetServerVariable is supported, although extended server variables do not exist (as defined by other servers.) All the usual Apache CGI environment variables are available from GetServerVariable, as well as the ALL_HTTP and ALL_RAW values.
trans-unit.target: GetServerVariable 支持，虽然扩展服务器变量不存在（被其它服务器定义。）所有常用的Apache CGI环境变量可从 GetServerVariable ，还有 ALL_HTTP 和 ALL_RAW 值。

trans-unit.source: GlobalLog is not valid in virtual host context.
trans-unit.target: GlobalLog 在虚拟主机上下文中无效。

trans-unit.source: GlobalLog is used by virtual hosts that define their own CustomLog, unlike a globally specified CustomLog.
trans-unit.target: GlobalLog 与全局指定的 CustomLog 不同，定义了自己的 CustomLog 的虚拟主机使用GlobalLog。

trans-unit.source: IndexOrderDefault takes two arguments. The first must be either Ascending or Descending, indicating the direction of the sort. The second argument must be one of the keywords Name, Date, Size, or Description, and identifies the primary key. The secondary key is always the ascending filename.
trans-unit.target: IndexOrderDefault 接受两个参数。第一个必须是 Ascending 或 Descending ，指示排序的方向。第二个参数必须是关键字 Name ， Date ， Size 或 Description 之一，并标识主键。第二键始终是升序文件名。

trans-unit.source: LimitInternalRecursion prevents the server from crashing when entering an infinite loop of internal redirects or subrequests. Such loops are usually caused by misconfigurations.
trans-unit.target: LimitInternalRecursion 防止在进入内部重定向或子请求的无限循环时服务器崩溃。这样的循环通常是由错误配置引起的。

trans-unit.source: ListenCoresBucketsRatio can improve the scalability when accepting new connections is/becomes the bottleneck. On systems with a large number of CPU cores, enabling this feature has been tested to show significant performances improvement and shorter responses time.
trans-unit.target: ListenCoresBucketsRatio 当接受新连接成为瓶颈时，ListenCoresBucketsRatio可以提高可伸缩性。在具有大量CPU内核的系统上，启用此功能已经过测试，显示出显着的性能改进和更短的响应时间。

trans-unit.source: LogLevel adjusts the verbosity of the messages recorded in the error logs (see ErrorLog directive). The following levels are available, in order of decreasing significance:
trans-unit.target: LogLevel 调整错误日志中记录的消息的详细程度（请参见 ErrorLog 指令）。按重要性递减的顺序，可以使用以下 level ：

trans-unit.source: Makefile.win is the top level Apache makefile. To compile Apache on Windows, simply use one of the following commands to build the release or debug flavor:
trans-unit.target: Makefile.win 是顶级Apache makefile。要在Windows上编译Apache，只需使用以下命令之一来构建 release 或 debug 版本：

trans-unit.source: MaxRequestWorkers was called MaxClients before version 2.3.13. The old name is still supported.
trans-unit.target: MaxRequestWorkers 在版本2.3.13之前，MaxRequestWorkers被称为 MaxClients 。仍然支持旧名称。

trans-unit.source: MultiViews is a per-directory option, meaning it can be set with an Options directive within a <Directory>, <Location> or <Files> section in httpd.conf, or (if AllowOverride is properly set) in .htaccess files. Note that Options All does not set MultiViews; you have to ask for it by name.
trans-unit.target: MultiViews 是一个按目录的选项，这意味着可以在 httpd.conf 的 <Directory> ， <Location> 或 <Files> 部分或 .htaccess 文件中（如果正确设置了 AllowOverride 的情况下）使用 Options 指令设置它。请注意， Options All 不会设置 MultiViews ; 您必须按名称要求。

trans-unit.source: MultiViews may also apply to searches for the file named by the DirectoryIndex directive, if the server is trying to index a directory. If the configuration files specify
trans-unit.target: MultiViews 如果服务器正在尝试为目录建立索引，则MultiViews也可以用于搜索 DirectoryIndex 指令命名的文件。如果配置文件指定

trans-unit.source: MultiviewsMatch is not allowed in a <Location> or <LocationMatch> section.
trans-unit.target: MultiviewsMatch <Location> 或 <LocationMatch> 部分中不允许使用MultiviewsMatch。

trans-unit.source: MultiviewsMatch permits three different behaviors for mod_negotiation's Multiviews feature. Multiviews allows a request for a file, e.g.index.html, to match any negotiated extensions following the base request, e.g.index.html.en, index.html.fr, or index.html.gz.
trans-unit.target: MultiviewsMatch 允许mod_negotiation的Multiviews功能具有三种不同的行为。多视图允许对文件（例如 index.html )的请求匹配基本请求（例如 index.html.en ， index.html.fr 或 index.html.gz )之后的任何协商的扩展名。

trans-unit.source: N and M are used to specify substrings of the name. N selects from the dot-separated components of the name, and M selects characters within whatever N has selected. M is optional and defaults to zero if it isn't present; the dot must be present if and only if M is present. The interpretation is as follows:
trans-unit.target: N 和 M 用于指定名称的子字符串。 N 从名称的以点分隔的部分中选择，并且 M 在选择的 N 中选择字符。 M 是可选的，如果不存在，则默认为零；当且仅当存在 M 时，点必须存在。解释如下：

trans-unit.source: NameWidth=* grows the column to the necessary width.
trans-unit.target: NameWidth=* 将列增长到必要的宽度。

trans-unit.source: NameWidth=n fixes the column width to n bytes wide.
trans-unit.target: NameWidth=n 将列宽固定为 n 个字节宽。

trans-unit.source: O=A sorts the listing in Ascending Order
trans-unit.target: O=A 以升序对列表进行排序

trans-unit.source: O=D sorts the listing in Descending Order
trans-unit.target: O=D 按降序对列表进行排序

trans-unit.source: P=pattern lists only files matching the given pattern
trans-unit.target: P=pattern 仅列出与给定 pattern 匹配的文件

trans-unit.source: ProxyHTMLMeta has two effects. Firstly and most importantly it enables detection of character encodings declared in the form
trans-unit.target: ProxyHTMLMeta 具有两个作用。首先也是最重要的是，它可以检测以以下形式声明的字符编码

trans-unit.source: REDIRECT_ environment variables are created from the environment variables which existed prior to the redirect. They are renamed with a REDIRECT_ prefix, i.e., HTTP_USER_AGENT becomes REDIRECT_HTTP_USER_AGENT.
trans-unit.target: REDIRECT_ 环境变量是根据重定向之前存在的环境变量创建的。他们被重命名与 REDIRECT_ 前缀，即， HTTP_USER_AGENT 变成 REDIRECT_HTTP_USER_AGENT 。

trans-unit.source: REDIRECT_URL, REDIRECT_STATUS, and REDIRECT_QUERY_STRING are guaranteed to be set, and the other headers will be set only if they existed prior to the error condition.
trans-unit.target: REDIRECT_URL 保证设置REDIRECT_URL， REDIRECT_STATUS 和 REDIRECT_QUERY_STRING ，并且仅在错误条件之前存在其他标头的情况下，才设置其他标头。

trans-unit.source: ReadClient retrieves the request body exceeding the initial buffer (defined by ISAPIReadAheadBuffer). Based on the ISAPIReadAheadBuffer setting (number of bytes to buffer prior to calling the ISAPI handler) shorter requests are sent complete to the extension when it is invoked. If the request is longer, the ISAPI extension must use ReadClient to retrieve the remaining request body.
trans-unit.target: ReadClient 检索超出初始缓冲区（由 ISAPIReadAheadBuffer 定义）的请求正文。基于 ISAPIReadAheadBuffer 设置（调用ISAPI处理程序之前要缓冲的字节数），较短的请求在被调用时会完整地发送到扩展。如果请求更长，则ISAPI扩展必须使用 ReadClient 来检索剩余的请求正文。

trans-unit.source: Redirect directives take precedence over Alias and ScriptAlias directives, irrespective of their ordering in the configuration file. Redirect directives inside a Location take precedence over Redirect and Alias directives with an URL-path.
trans-unit.target: Redirect 指令优先于 Alias 和 ScriptAlias 指令，无论它们在配置文件中的顺序如何。Location中的 Redirect 指令优先于带有 URL-path 的 Redirect 和 Alias 指令。

trans-unit.source: Remote_Addr - the IP address of the client making the request
Remote_Host - the hostname (if available) of the client making the request
trans-unit.target: Remote_Host -发出请求的客户端的主机名（如果有）

trans-unit.source: RemoveEncoding directives are processed after any AddEncoding directives, so it is possible they may undo the effects of the latter if both occur within the same directory configuration.
trans-unit.target: RemoveEncoding 指令在任何 AddEncoding 指令之后进行处理，因此，如果它们都出现在同一目录配置中，则它们有可能撤消后者的影响。

trans-unit.source: RemoveType directives are processed after any AddType directives, so it is possible they may undo the effects of the latter if both occur within the same directory configuration.
trans-unit.target: RemoveType 伪指令在任何 AddType 伪指令之后进行处理，因此，如果它们都出现在同一目录配置中，则它们有可能撤消后者的影响。

trans-unit.source: Request_Method - the name of the method being used (GET, POST, et cetera)
Request_Protocol - the name and version of the protocol with which the request was made (e.g., "HTTP/0.9", "HTTP/1.1", etc.)
trans-unit.target: Request_Protocol -发出请求的协议的名称和版本（例如 “ HTTP / 0.9”，“ HTTP / 1.1” 等）

trans-unit.source: Request_URI - the resource requested on the HTTP request line -- generally the portion of the URL following the scheme and host portion without the query string. See the RewriteCond directive of mod_rewrite for extra information on how to match your query string.
trans-unit.target: Request_URI -HTTP请求行上请求的资源-通常是方案后面的URL部分和主机部分，没有查询字符串。有关如何匹配查询字符串的更多信息，请参见 mod_rewrite 的 RewriteCond 指令。

trans-unit.source: SSLCertificateChainFile became obsolete with version 2.4.8, when SSLCertificateFile was extended to also load intermediate CA certificates from the server certificate file.
trans-unit.target: SSLCertificateChainFile 变得过时与2.4.8版本，当 SSLCertificateFile 扩展到还从服务器证书文件加载中间CA证书。

trans-unit.source: SSLRequire is deprecated and should in general be replaced by Require expr. The so called ap_expr syntax of Require expr is a superset of the syntax of SSLRequire, with the following exception:
